mapper.select: SELECT ID, PASSWD, NAME, NICK, GENDER, BIRTH, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDR, GRADE, CGRADE, POINT, BANCNT1, BANCNT2, PWCONT, AUTH1YN, AUTH2YN, CREAFLG, ADMINFLG, USTATUS FROM T3_USER

SELECT B.TBNO AS TBNO, ID, BPRICE, BTITLE, HITS, LIKES, D1.CINFO AS BRDNAME, D2.CINFO AS KINDNAME, D3.CINFO AS CATE1NAME, D4.CINFO AS CATE2NAME, D5.CINFO AS CATE3NAME, D7.CINFO AS BSTATUSNAME, T1.PATH AS PATH, CDATE, UDATE, DELYN FROM T3_TBRD B INNER JOIN T3_DESC D1 ON B.BRDFLG = D1.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D2 ON B.KIND = D2.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D3 ON B.CATE1 = D3.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D4 ON B.CATE2 = D4.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D5 ON B.CATE3 = D5.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D7 ON B.BSTATUS = D7.CNUM LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBNO,PATH,REP FROM T3_TIMG WHERE REP='Y') T1 ON B.TBNO = T1.TBNO ORDER BY TBNO DESC;

SELECT B.TBNO AS TBNO, ID, BPRICE, BTITLE, BCONT, HITS, LIKES, D1.CINFO AS BRDNAME, D2.CINFO AS KINDNAME, D3.CINFO AS CATE1NAME, D4.CINFO AS CATE2NAME, D5.CINFO AS CATE3NAME, D6.CINFO AS BPRODNAME, D7.CINFO AS BSTATUSNAME, D8.CINFO AS BPURNAME, D9.CINFO AS BBOXNAME, D10.CINFO AS BRCPTNAME, D11.CINFO AS BCMSNAME, D12.CINFO AS LOCAL1NAME, D13.CINFO AS LOCAL2NAME, D14.CINFO AS LOCAL3NAME, T1.PATH AS PATH, CDATE, UDATE, DELYN FROM T3_TBRD B INNER JOIN T3_DESC D1 ON B.BRDFLG = D1.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D2 ON B.KIND = D2.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D3 ON B.CATE1 = D3.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D4 ON B.CATE2 = D4.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D5 ON B.CATE3 = D5.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D6 ON B.BPROD = D6.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D7 ON B.BSTATUS = D7.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D8 ON B.BPROD = D8.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D9 ON B.BBOX = D9.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D10 ON B.BRCPT = D10.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D11 ON B.BCMS = D11.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D12 ON B.LOCAL1 = D12.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D13 ON B.LOCAL2 = D13.CNUM LEFT JOIN T3_DESC D14 ON B.LOCAL3 = D14.CNUM LEFT JOIN (SELECT TBNO,PATH,REP FROM T3_TIMG WHERE REP='Y') T1 ON B.TBNO = T1.TBNO ORDER BY TBNO DESC;
